name: Wonderland Trails
description: Build a route for the settlers and help them return to their native lands. Switch the direction on the road in time and guide your heroes on the right way.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Processor: Core2Duo Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD2000 Storage: 600 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: QuadCore Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD2000 or better Storage: 700 MB available space
